name: Shellder
author: Mitsuhiro Arita
flavor_text: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

attacks.name: Supersonic
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused.

attacks.name: Hide in Shell
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all damage done to Shellder during your opponent’s next turn. (Any other effects of attacks still happen.)
